_88MashProcedureType.description: This defines the procedure for performing unique mashing processes.

$eref.description: MashStepType - a per step representation occurring during the mash.

___ramp_time.description: The amount of time  that passes before this step begins. eg moving from a mash step (step 1) of 148F, to a new temperature step of 156F (step 2) may take 8 minutes to heat the mash. Step 2 would have a ramp time of 8 minutes.

___water_grain_ratio.description: Also known as the mash thickness. eg 1.75 qt/lb or 3.65 L/kg.

___infuse_temperature.description: Temperature of the water for an infusion step.

___grain_temperature.description: Initial grain temperature prior to the start of the mash.
